title: Kinsou no Vermeil: Gakeppuchi Majutsushi wa Saikyou no Yakusai to Mahou Sekai wo Tsukisusumu
original_name: 金装のヴェルメイユ ～崖っぷち魔術師は最強の厄災と魔法世界を突き進む～
sinopse:
Alto, who was dangerously close to repeating a year, ends up invoking a magic formation from a book he found by chance and summons a demon named Vermeil who had been sealed.

(Source: Square Enix, translated)
